topics.body:
"@trashboat":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55519c4663687209bad70200#post_55519c4663687209bad70200
[bq="trashboat"]While I love None Piece. I would still love to see some guys like Team four star give One Piece the abridged treatment.[/bq]
You do realize that will never happen right?
"@Albus Fahrenheits":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55519c67636872719b750d00#post_55519c67636872719b750d00
That's kind of cute.

"@Albus Fahrenheits":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55519c67636872719b750d00#post_55519c67636872719b750d00
Are you saying that's real?
*THAT'S REAL?!*
~^I don't remember btw...^~

Anyway, I made a Twitter with my real name and I post random stuff.
Made it because Facebook sucks now.
Got locked out for an entire day.
Got it back though.
topics.author: 4fe1b9f47f123b13df002976

topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55519d07636872719b6e0e00#post_55519d07636872719b6e0e00
I know very well that it's a very tall order. (If you take what TFS did with DBZ and apply it to One Piece instead, They very likely woudn't even be at Skypeia yet.)

Edit: Okay. They likely would skip the filler arcs. But that still woudn't even put them in Water 7.

[bq="Albus Fahrenheits"]

And I would just like to clear out that I do not have a fetish for that. [/bq]
We believe you. Like, totally.
topics.author: 5007bbdf7f123b112f00023a

topics.body:
Seriously though. DBZ abridged is highly praised because It highly shortens the series and It's very good on its own merits. (If not better in the source material.) I've seen it recommended many times over the source material.

I believe that One piece highly deserves a similar treatment. (I highly doubt that it could be made better. But it could still be highly shortened and allow people to get into it much easier as a result.)

Yes. I am aware of the reasons why that would never happen anytime soon. (TFS has their hands full with DBZ abridged and Hellsing abridged. And no one else has the patience to take on an anime of that caliber.)
topics.author: 5062d6f17f123b3e16001184

Speaking of which, I need to go pick her up from summer class soon. Later.

"@HJSDGCE":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5551a69a6368723570c62600#post_5551a69a6368723570c62600
If you ever want to fuck with someone like to the point satan would tell you to calm down replace in someone's code the number 0 with the letter O and if they write sloppy code they're legitimately fucked.

I'll just straight up admit; one time this douchebag in class kept taking credit for other's people's coding work so I just straight up gave him a "revised" version of my program that was meant to be as sloppy as humanly possible and replaced a #0 with the letter O; he almost had a nervous breakdown.  He never tried to steal anyone's work in that class again.
